definitions.text: a position or opinion or judgment reached after consideration
examples: a decision unfavorable to the opposition
his conclusion took the evidence into account

definitions.text: the temporal end; the concluding time
examples: the stopping point of each round was signaled by a bell
the market was up at the finish
they were playing better at the close of the season
his death marked the ending of an era
when these final episodes are broadcast it will be the finish of the show

definitions.text: the proposition arrived at by logical reasoning (such as the proposition that must follow from the major and minor premises of a syllogism)

examples: the conclusion of a business deal
the conclusion of the peace treaty

definitions.text: the last section of a communication
examples: in conclusion I want to say...

definitions.text: the act of making up your mind about something
examples: the burden of decision was his
